data.title: Danish Royal Family
data.meta_description: For more information about the Danish Royal Family, past and present, see Unofficial Royalty: Danish Index. Unless otherwise noted, all photos below are from Wikipedia. King Frederik X Queen Mary Q…
data.text:
King Frederik X

Queen Mary

Queen Margarethe II

Crown Prince Christian

Princess Isabella

Prince Vincent

Princess Josephine

Prince Joachim

Princess Marie

Princess Benedikte

King Frederik X

Full Name: Frederik André Henrik Christian

Title: His Majesty The King

Reign: January 14, 2024 – present

Born: May 26, 1968 at Rigshospitalet, Copenhagen

Parents: Queen Margrethe II of Denmark and Henri de Laborde de Monpezat

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 1

Married: Mary Elizabeth Donaldson on May 14, 2004 at Copenhagen Cathedral

Children:

– HRH Crown Prince Christian Valdemar Henri John, born October 15, 2005

– HRH Princess Isabella Henrietta Ingrid Margrethe, born April 21, 2007

– HRH Prince Vincent Frederik Minik Alexander, born January 8, 2011

– HRH Princess Josephine Sofia Ivalo Mathilda, born January 8, 2011

Education:

1974-1981: Krebs’ Skole in Copenhagen, Denmark

1982-1983: École des Roches in Normandy, France

1983-1986: Øregaard Gymnasium in Hellerup, Denmark

1992-1993: Harvard University, Science of Government

1994: Danish UN mission in New York, training position

1995: University of Aarhus in Denmark, Masters of Political Science

1998-1999: Danish Embassy in Paris, First Secretary

2001-2002: Royal Danish Defense College, training for leaders

Link: Unofficial Royalty: King Frederik X of Denmark

Queen Mary

Full Name: Mary Elizabeth Donaldson

Title: Her Majesty The Queen

Born: February 5, 1972 in Hobart, Tasmania, Australia

Parents: John Dalgleish Donaldson and Henrietta Clark

Married: Crown Prince Frederik of Denmark on May 14, 2004 at Copenhagen Cathedral

Children:

– HRH Crown Prince Christian Valdemar Henri John, born October 15, 2005

– HRH Princess Isabella Henrietta Ingrid Margrethe, born April 21, 2007

– HRH Prince Vincent Frederik Minik Alexander, born January 8, 2011

– HRH Princess Josephine Sofia Ivalo Mathild, born January 8, 2011

Education:

1975: Clear Lake City Elementary School in Houston, Texas

1975-1977: Sandy Bay Infants School in Hobart, Tasmania

1978-1982: Waimea Heights Primary School in Hobart, Tasmania

1983-1986: Taroona High School in Hobart, Tasmania

1986-1988: Hobart Matriculation College in Hobart, Tasmania

1989-1994: University of Tasmania, Bachelors of Commerce and Law

1994-1996: The Advertising Federation of Australia, Certificate in Advertising; Australian Direct Marketing Association, Certificate in Direct Marketing

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Queen Mary of Denmark

Queen Margrethe

Full Name: Margrethe Alexandrine Þorhildur Ingrid

Title: Her Majesty Queen Margrethe

Reign: January 14, 1972 – January 14, 2024

Born: April 16, 1940 at Amalienborg Palace, Copenhagen

Parents: King Frederik IX of Denmark and Princess Ingrid of Sweden

Married: Henri de Laborde de Monpezat on June 10, 1967 at Holmens Kirke in Copenhagen

Children:

– HRH Crown Prince Frederik André Henrik Christian (King Frederik X), born May 26, 1968

– HRH Prince Joachim Holger Waldemar Christian, born June 7, 1969

Grandchildren:

– HE Count Nikolai of Monpezat, son of Prince Joachim and Alexandra Manley (1999)

– HE Count Felix of Monpezat, son of Prince Joachim and Alexandra Manley (2002)

– HRH Prince Christian, son of Crown Prince Frederik and Mary Donaldson(2005)

– HRH Princess Isabella, daughter of Crown Prince Frederik and Mary Donaldson (2007)

– HE Count Henrik of Monpezat, son of Prince Joachim and Marie Cavalier (2009)

– HRH Prince Vincent, son of Crown Prince Frederik and Mary Donaldson (2011)

– HRH Princess Josephine, daughter of Crown Prince Frederik and Mary Donaldson (2011)

– HE Countess Athena of Monpezat, daughter of Prince Joachim and Marie Cavalier (2012)

Education:

1946-1959: Zahles Skole

1955-1956: North Foreland Lodge, in Hampshire, England

1960: Copenhagen University, Philosophy

1960-1961: Cambridge University, diploma in prehistoric archaeology

1961-1962: Aarhus University, political science

1963: Sorbonne, political science

1965: London School of Economics, political science

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Queen Margrethe II of Denmark

Crown Prince Christian

Full Name: Christian Valdemar Henri John

Title: His Royal Highness The Crown Prince

Born: October 15, 2005 at Copenhagen University Hospital

Parents: King Frederik X and Mary Donaldson

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 1

Education:

2007 – 2011: Queen Louise’s Children’s House in Fredensborg, Denmark

2011 – present: Trane Overgaard School in Gentofte, Denmark

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Crown Prince Christian of Denmark

Princess Isabella

Full Name: Isabella Henrietta Ingrid Margrethe

Title: His Royal Highness Princess Isabella

Born: April 21, 2007 at Copenhagen University Hospital

Parents: King Frederik X and Mary Donaldson

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 2

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Princess Isabella

Prince Vincent

Full Name: Vincent Frederik Minik Alexander

Title: His Royal Highness Prince Vincent

Born: January 8, 2011 at Copenhagen University Hospital

Parents: King Frederik X and Mary Donaldson

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 3

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Prince Vincent

Princess Josephine

Full Name: Josephine Sofia Ivalo Mathilda

Title: Her Royal Highness Princess Josephine

Born: January 8, 2011 at Copenhagen University Hospital

Parents: King Frederik X and Mary Donaldson

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 4

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Princess Josephine

Prince Joachim

Full Name: Joachim Holger Waldemar Christian

Title: His Royal Highness Prince Joachim

Born: June 7, 1969 at Rigshospitalet, Copenhagen

Parents: Queen Margrethe II of Denmark and Henri de Laborde de Monpezat

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 5

Married: (1) Alexandra Christina Manley on November 18, 1995 at the Chapel of Frederiksborg Castle at Hillerød, divorced April 8, 2005

Children:

HE Count Nikolai William Alexander Frederik of Monpezat, born August 28, 1999

HE Prince Felix Henrik Valdemar Christian of Monpezat, born July 22, 2002

Married: (2) Marie Agathe Odile Cavallier on May 24, 2008 at Møgeltønder Church in Sonderjutland

Children:

HE Count Henrik Carl Joachim Alain of Monpezat, born May 4, 2009

HE Countess Athena Marguerite Françoise Marie of Monpezat, born January 24, 2012

Education:

1974-1982: Krebs’ Skole in Copenhagen, Denmark

1982-1983: École des Roches in Normandy, France

1983-1986: Øregaard Gymnasium in Hellerup, Denmark

1986-1987: Worked on a farm in Wagga Wagga in Australia

1991-1993: Den Classenske Agerbrugskole Næsgaard, agrarian economics on the Island of Falster, Denmark

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Prince Joachim

Princess Marie

Full Name: Marie Agathe Odile Cavallier

Title: Her Royal Highness Princess Marie

Born: February 6, 1976 in Paris, France

Parents: Alain Cavallier and Françoise Grassiot

Married: Prince Joachim of Denmark on May 24, 2008 at Møgeltønder Church in Sonderjutland

Children:

HE Count Henrik Carl Joachim Alain of Monpezat, born May 4, 2009

HE Countess Athena Marguerite Françoise Marie of Monpezat, born January 24, 2012

Education:

1981-1989: Primary school in Paris

1989-1993: Beau-Soleil International Boarding School in Villars, Switzerland

1993-1995: Babson College in Wellesley, Massachusetts USA

1997-1999: Marymount Manhattan College in New York, New York, USA

Link: Unofficial Royalty: Princess Marie

Princess Benedikte

Full Name: Benedikte Astrid Ingeborg Ingrid

Title: Her Royal Highness Princess Benedikte

Born: April 29, 1944 at Amalienborg Palace, Copenhagen

Parents: King Frederik IX of Denmark and Princess Ingrid of Sweden

Place in line of succession to the Danish throne: 10

Married: HH Prince Richard, 6th Prince of Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg on February 3, 1968 in the Chapel of Fredensborg Palace (deceased March 13, 2017)

Children:

– HH Prince Gustav, 7th Prince of Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg, born January 12, 1969

– HH Princess Alexandra of Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg, born November 20, 1970

– HH Princess Nathalie of Sayn-Wittgenstein-Berleburg, born May 2, 1975

Note: Princess Benedikte’s children and grandchildren are not in the line of succession to the Danish throne
